sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO BASS2640 ( DPOB_CD , STP_INTTN_SEPT_VAL , WKDY_ERY_GTWK_EXTPY_MGFTN , WKDY_ERY_GTWK_EXTPY_SUM , WKDY_NOR_DUTY_EXTPY_MGFTN , WKDY_NOR_DUTY_EXTPY_SUM , WKDY_EXTNN_EXTPY_MGFTN , WKDY_EXTNN_EXTPY_SUM , WKDY_NGT_EXTPY_MGFTN , WKDY_NGT_EXTPY_SUM , PUBC_HODY_NOR_DUTY_MGFTN , PUBC_HODY_NOR_DUTY_SUM , PUBC_HODY_EXTNN_MGFTN , PUBC_HODY_EXTNN_SUM , PAY_DUTY_TM_CALC_SEIL_NUM , WORK_BUSIN_NUM , WORK_UNT_BUSIN_NUM , MANGE_UNT_BUSIN_NUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #stpInttnSeptVal# , #wkdyEryGtwkExtpyMgftn# , #wkdyEryGtwkExtpySum# , #wkdyNorDutyExtpyMgftn# , #wkdyNorDutyExtpySum# , #wkdyExtnnExtpyMgftn# , #wkdyExtnnExtpySum# , #wkdyNgtExtpyMgftn# , #wkdyNgtExtpySum# , #pubcHodyNorDutyMgftn# , #pubcHodyNorDutySum# , #pubcHodyExtnnMgftn# , #pubcHodyExtnnSum# , #payDutyTmCalcSeilNum# , #workBusinNum# , #workUntBusinNum# , #mangeUntBusinNum# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BASS2640 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , STP_INTTN_SEPT_VAL=#stpInttnSeptVal# , WKDY_ERY_GTWK_EXTPY_MGFTN=#wkdyEryGtwkExtpyMgftn# , WKDY_ERY_GTWK_EXTPY_SUM=#wkdyEryGtwkExtpySum# , WKDY_NOR_DUTY_EXTPY_MGFTN=#wkdyNorDutyExtpyMgftn# , WKDY_NOR_DUTY_EXTPY_SUM=#wkdyNorDutyExtpySum# , WKDY_EXTNN_EXTPY_MGFTN=#wkdyExtnnExtpyMgftn# , WKDY_EXTNN_EXTPY_SUM=#wkdyExtnnExtpySum# , WKDY_NGT_EXTPY_MGFTN=#wkdyNgtExtpyMgftn# , WKDY_NGT_EXTPY_SUM=#wkdyNgtExtpySum# , PUBC_HODY_NOR_DUTY_MGFTN=#pubcHodyNorDutyMgftn# , PUBC_HODY_NOR_DUTY_SUM=#pubcHodyNorDutySum# , PUBC_HODY_EXTNN_MGFTN=#pubcHodyExtnnMgftn# , PUBC_HODY_EXTNN_SUM=#pubcHodyExtnnSum# , PAY_DUTY_TM_CALC_SEIL_NUM=#payDutyTmCalcSeilNum# , WORK_BUSIN_NUM=#workBusinNum# , WORK_UNT_BUSIN_NUM=#workUntBusinNum# , MANGE_UNT_BUSIN_NUM=#mangeUntBusinNum# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND STP_INTTN_SEPT_VAL=#stpInttnSeptVal#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM BASS2640 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND STP_INTTN_SEPT_VAL=#stpInttnSeptVal#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , STP_INTTN_SEPT_VAL , WKDY_ERY_GTWK_EXTPY_MGFTN , WKDY_ERY_GTWK_EXTPY_SUM , WKDY_NOR_DUTY_EXTPY_MGFTN , WKDY_NOR_DUTY_EXTPY_SUM , WKDY_EXTNN_EXTPY_MGFTN , WKDY_EXTNN_EXTPY_SUM , WKDY_NGT_EXTPY_MGFTN , WKDY_NGT_EXTPY_SUM , PUBC_HODY_NOR_DUTY_MGFTN , PUBC_HODY_NOR_DUTY_SUM , PUBC_HODY_EXTNN_MGFTN , PUBC_HODY_EXTNN_SUM , PAY_DUTY_TM_CALC_SEIL_NUM , WORK_BUSIN_NUM , WORK_UNT_BUSIN_NUM , MANGE_UNT_BUSIN_NUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM BASS2640 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND STP_INTTN_SEPT_VAL=#stpInttnSeptVal#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , STP_INTTN_SEPT_VAL , WKDY_ERY_GTWK_EXTPY_MGFTN , WKDY_ERY_GTWK_EXTPY_SUM , WKDY_NOR_DUTY_EXTPY_MGFTN , WKDY_NOR_DUTY_EXTPY_SUM , WKDY_EXTNN_EXTPY_MGFTN , WKDY_EXTNN_EXTPY_SUM , WKDY_NGT_EXTPY_MGFTN , WKDY_NGT_EXTPY_SUM , PUBC_HODY_NOR_DUTY_MGFTN , PUBC_HODY_NOR_DUTY_SUM , PUBC_HODY_EXTNN_MGFTN , PUBC_HODY_EXTNN_SUM , PAY_DUTY_TM_CALC_SEIL_NUM , WORK_BUSIN_NUM , WORK_UNT_BUSIN_NUM , MANGE_UNT_BUSIN_NUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM BASS2640 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
STP_INTTN_SEPT_VAL LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , STP_INTTN_SEPT_VAL DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM BASS2640 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
STP_INTTN_SEPT_VAL LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
